Affix.Name: Defender's Will
Affix.Desc: For each different element present in your own party, the wearer's Elemental RES to that corresponding element is increased by 30%.

EQUIP_RING.Name: Guardian's Vessel
EQUIP_RING.Desc: A metal vessel that can be filled with a drink to dispel the loneliness of the long watch.

EQUIP_NECKLACE.Name: Guardian's Sigil
EQUIP_NECKLACE.Desc: A feather-shaped brooch that symbolizes someoneâ€™s yearning to defend others like a shield.

EQUIP_DRESS.Name: Guardian's Band
EQUIP_DRESS.Desc: A fabric band dyed indigo by the darkness of night. Can also double as a bandage in the event of an emergency.

EQUIP_BRACER.Name: Guardian's Flower
EQUIP_BRACER.Desc: An iris that was cherished by the guardian. Unfortunately, the chance never came for it to be given to whom the guardian loved.

EQUIP_SHOES.Name: Guardian's Clock
EQUIP_SHOES.Desc: A small timekeeping gadget. On moonless nights, it was the only way its former owner could know the time.
